name: Fishing Float
description:
"Fishing Float" is a 2D platformer game with fishing mechanics. It's about a little boy on a simple quest for their peace and tranquility, fishing and traveling to different places. Movement:

• A/D - Hero Movement
• E - Interaction
• Space - Start Fishing

Fishing:

Pressing and then holding the SPACE button starts fishing, when the time expires (when the fish bites) the player must release the SPACE button in time at a certain point (shown on the pop-up indicator), after which the fish will be caught.

Store:

• There is a character marked "Shop" in the location.
• Approach and press the action button to open a pop-up window in which you can navigate to another location or open the store menu.
• In the store you can sell the fish you catch or unique objects.

House:

In the "House" you can improve your equipment to catch fish faster and more efficiently.

• Large variety of fish (72 species) + 6 unique
• Three different biomes
• Relaxing atmosphere
• Beautiful pixel graphics and music!
• Learn the basics with in-game tutorials

Thank you for playing our game, we offer you to download it on Android or PC to keep it with you forever!
Please tell us what you liked about it and what you would like to sеe.

Love from
